plugin-data.name: Robots - Pi Lab
plugin-data.description:
You can use a special HTML meta tag to tell robots not to index the content of a page, and/or not scan it for links to follow.

This was built specifically for Pi Lab and allows you to select a port to deny all on.

robots-plugin-active-warning: Bludit's 'Robots' plugin is still active... you are strongly advised to disable it.
